column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------Â A minibus caught on fire at 10:15 am on October 24
column8: Daun Penh district. There were no injuries.------The Sangyong minibus

column11: the van had been delivering (baby diapers?) from the Toul Kork antenna.------An electrical fire from the engine spread and engulfed the vehicle.------Firefighters arrived swiftly and the blaze was extinguished by 10:30 am. ------POST NEWS
